entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
